message:
A lot of great information yesterday at the Florida Human Trafficking Summit in Orlando. 
State Attorney General Pam Bondi said it very well and this is something we talk about frequently. Human trafficking can happen anywhere. 

Bondi said, "Hollywood has glamorized prostitution and kidnapping in movies like “Taken,” Unfortunately, the father doesn’t come in and save the child at the end of the day, Your child can be sitting at the dinner table every night and be a victim of human trafficking.”

data.description: State Attorney General Pam Bondi stressed the importance of global collaboration to end sexual slavery during opening remarks at Florida’s …
data.title: Pam Bondi urges collaboration at human trafficking summit - Florida Politics
